name: Piano Tile Black - Don't tap piano white tiles 2
name_original: Piano Tile Black - Don't tap piano white tiles 2
description:
Color Piano Tiles is the best piano game experience you can get on the complete play store. These piano tiles will give you the best touch which will be smooth to play with. It is also exciting as you will be required to play piano tiles in limited time of 10 seconds, sounds interesting? Hugely being among popular piano games, this will be added with different colors so it will be wonderful piano playing experience for kids too and will give different feel from other standard piano games to savvy players. Apart from not only being simple piano game, Color Piano Tiles comes with three different levels giving a complete dramatic environment of a game as it names.
Sound quality inside is also colorful as it senses to your ears and gives you a real piano sound with the thrill of playing as fast paced game. You could be best piano player however are you mad enough to play it fast enough to score?

Color Piano Tiles: Features & Highlights

Intelligent Piano Tiles Placement
Incepting New Colors for piano to provide best User Experience
Time perfection of moving tiles
Improvised for real touch feel
Updates ready for multiplayer gameplay features
#3 Levels:

Classic: For competing towards achiving the completion in shortest time, you can learn and be friendly with the Color piano tiles in this level, a warm up atmosphere for new players

Arcade: Black are symbol of bad, get them all! Take and tap over every black tile rigorously you see to kill it and that will give you beautiful sounds. An arcade with the feel of pressure freeing sense, that's best about unique Color piano tiles

Time: Time stipulated environment always tests your senses at best and this Color piano tiles game exactly does the same. You will get the maximum time of 10 seconds to play in this level of game and that is truly leveling up I guess. Tap over as many number of Color piano tiles as you can to achieve competitive scores and play relentlessly to compete your own scores. Share with your friends and let them learn new multicolor piano tiles for apt play.
